column2: Lincoln National Corp. is a holding company, which operates multiple insurance and retirement businesses through its subsidiary companies. The company is headquartered in Radnor, Pennsylvania and currently employs 11,034 full-time employees. The firm sells a range of wealth protection, accumulation and retirement income products and solutions, through its business segments. The firm operates through four segments: Annuities segment, which offers fixed (including indexed) and variable annuities; Retirement Plan Services segment, which provides employers with retirement plan products and services; Life Insurance segment, which focuses on the creation and protection of wealth through life insurance products, and Group Protection, which offers principally group non-medical insurance products. These products include fixed and indexed annuities, variable annuities, universal life insurance, variable universal life insurance, linked-benefit UL, term life insurance, indexed universal life insurance, employer-sponsored retirement plans and services, and group life, disability and dental.
